item.title: Gareth Gates - Listen To My Heart
item.description:
Endlessly everytime
I look into your eyes
I see forever
I don’t know why
But everytime we touch
I feel alive
There’s nothing
like it
People say that
love can’t be
That strong
and you might
Just believe them
let me show you
I will prove
them wrong
Listen to my heart
beat for you
Telling you
that I adore you

how much I feel inside

around you

I can do

with you

you really need

you are my
